content: this cheerful christmas stocking will put a smile on your child s face learn how to crochet the dreamy christmas stocking with the free pattern and tutorial on my hobby is crochet blog **don t miss a thing ** subscribe to my free newsletter 1 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 2 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 3 get more crochet inspiration in my pinterest boards 4 1 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 2 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 3 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/ 4 https //www pinterest de/myhobbyiscroche/
